thread.title: Attention *This Is Us* Fans: Here's a Sneak Peek of Jack and Rebecca's Wedding
thread.title_full: Attention *This Is Us* Fans: Here's a Sneak Peek of Jack and Rebecca's Wedding

title: Attention *This Is Us* Fans: Here's a Sneak Peek of Jack and Rebecca's Wedding
text:
Facebook PHOTO: NBC 
We hope it's not a spoiler to tell you that the parents at the center of the This Is Us family—Jack and Rebecca Pearson—are married, though technically I guess viewers didn't have proof they'd actually legally tied the knot...until now. NBC just released some new sneak peek photos and an adorable clip of next Tuesday's episode, which features Jack and Rebecca's courthouse wedding and reception at what we're currently speculating is a closed pizza parlor? Guess we'll have to watch and find out where all this is going down. 
Watch the video clip, below: 
Can we talk about Miguel's best man speech, though? #BestManGoals, #ToastGoals, and honestly, that montage gives us #MarriageGoals. 
Please just tell us how Jack died; this is cruel and unusual punishment. PHOTO: NBC 
As for photos from the set, Mandy Moore (Rebecca Pearson) posted a super cute wedding snap on her Instagram, which shows off the surprisingly chic '70s looks. Loading
